text: KMXO (1500 AM) is a Spanish-language radio station licensed to Merkel, Texas, and serving the Abilene area. Because KMXO shares the same frequency as "clear channel" station KSTP in St. Paul, Minnesota; it broadcasts only during the daytime hours. ==References== ==External links== * KMXO official website MXO Category:Radio stations established in 1963 Category:1963 establishments in Texas MXO
title: KMXO
